com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

Class Friends

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.Friends

  • public class Friends
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of Accounts that act as the friend list for the user. Includes a getter and ways to add or remove a friend account, check if it has a friend, clear the list, or look for a friend by index number
    See Also:
    Account

      Constructor and Description
      Friends()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addFriend(Account newFriend)
      Adds a new friend account into the list, but if the friend account has already been added, it throws the AlreadyAddedException
      void clear()
      removes all friend accounts from the list
      Account getFriend(java.lang.String friendUsername) 
      Account getFriendByIndex(int i)
      returns the friend at the index given by the parameter.
      java.util.ArrayList<Account> getFriends() 
      int getSize()
      returns the number of friends, the size of the list of accounts.
      boolean hasFriend(Account friend)
      Checks to see if the list contains the friend account given in the parameter

      • getFriends

        public java.util.ArrayList<Account> getFriends()

      • addFriend

        public int addFriend(Account newFriend)
              throws AlreadyAddedException
        Adds a new friend account into the list, but if the friend account has already been added, it throws the AlreadyAddedException
        Parameters:
        newFriend - - the friend being put into the list
        Returns:
        int - shows success
        Throws:
        AlreadyAddedException

      • unFriend

        public void unFriend(Account friend)
        removes the friend account from the list
        Parameters:
        friend - - the friend account being removed

      • hasFriend

        public boolean hasFriend(Account friend)
        Checks to see if the list contains the friend account given in the parameter
        Parameters:
        friend - - the friend account being checked
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the list does have this friend account

      • getFriend

        public Account getFriend(java.lang.String friendUsername)

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        returns the number of friends, the size of the list of accounts.
        Returns:
        int - the size of the list

      • clear

        public void clear()
        removes all friend accounts from the list

      • getFriendByIndex

        public Account getFriendByIndex(int i)
                         throws NegativeNumberException,
                                TooLongException
        returns the friend at the index given by the parameter. Throws a TooLongException if the parameter int is longer than the list size, throws NegativeNumberException if the int parameter is negative
        Parameters:
        i - - the position in the list to check
        Returns:
        Account - the account at the given position
        Throws:
        NegativeNumberException
        TooLongException
